cause.description:
America was a great nation founded on principles such as the right to free speech. However people such as Don Imus have come to realize that this is just not true. While a small amount of Political Correctness isn't bad, the pervasive political correctness pushed by people such as the ACLU is destroying America. Let's end this national nightmare and restore our freedom of speech.
1. End the pervasive Political Correctness in American Culture Today
2. Get Don Imus a new Job
cause.mission: Stop The Obsessive Political Correctness in American Culutre Today
cause.name: Bring Back Free Speech
